job.title: Software Engineer (Frontend)
job.industry: Computer Software,Consumer Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: As an engineer on the observability application team, you'll help build the next-generation of observability experiences that are used by every engineer at Uber to develop, scale, understand and monitor their systems in an environment with over 4000 micro-services, hundreds of thousands of CPU cores in multiple data-centers and the cloud, and hundreds of thousands of concurrent trips around the world. What the Candidate Will Do
